data.title: Ouzouer-sous-Bellegarde Vacation Rentals & Homes - Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.meta_description: Aug 9, 2024 - Rent from people in Ouzouer-sous-Bellegarde, France from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Cottage in Montigny-sur-Loing

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 108 reviews4.94 (108)

Cottage in the heart of the Fontainebleau forest.

Small cozy house in a quiet area, on the edge of the forest, at the foot of paths and climbing spots (crashpad on request). Swimming nearby. Located a 10-minute walk from the train station of Montigny-sur-Loing, 55 minutes from Paris Gare de Lyon and 10 min on foot from all the shops in the village. Living room equipped with a large comfortable sofa bed, cable TV and wifi. Fully equipped kitchen. Mezzanine bedroom with 160x200 bed. Bathroom with shower and bathtub garden view. Equipped for families and children.

Home in Noyers

4.86 out of 5 average rating, 288 reviews4.86 (288)

Cottage Chantilly

With a free wifi connection, the Chantilly cottage is located in Noyers, 46 km from Orléans and 110 km south of Paris, the Eiffel Tower, Montargis is 18 km away, the Loire castles of Sully Gien, Chambord, Disney 140 km, parking private, linens provided. BBC available. 1 dishwasher tablet offered. Bottle of water. Coffee, tea and sugar provided. Welcome drink from 5 nights. Evening meal made by Eric and breakfast are possible on request and at an additional cost. Pets not allowed.

Home in Vitry-aux-Loges

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 110 reviews4.96 (110)

Pool and spa relaxation

⭐⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ @Relaxation Billiards & Spa ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Possibility to take a cleaning package on request. For more information, please do not hesitate to ask me any questions before booking or to contact me directly via Relaxation Billiards and Spa. Between canal and forests, come and recharge your batteries in this 160 m2 house in a quiet residential area, close to the center of the village (12 min walk by the canal) with all the amenities: superette, butcher, bars, pharmacy, bakery...

Home in Neuville-aux-Bois

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 375 reviews4.98 (375)

rural cottage 7 people

between Orléans and Pithiviers,in a clearing of 22 ha of grassland in the Orleans forest,adjoining our main house, the cottage ( 85m2) is located in an old stable , 5 km from Neuville aux Bois. fully equipped (washing machine dishwasher microwave etc...) 3 bedrooms (3 beds 90, 2 beds 140 ), terrace , private garden not overlooked, barbecue, boat, fishing,large sheltered playground, table football, ping pong,instruments available (djembés synth guitar battery), flexible hours

Home in Sully-sur-Loire

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 191 reviews4.99 (191)

Belle longère Sully-sur-Loire, 6 horse boxes

Pretty solognote farmhouse of 250 m2 4 km from Sully-sur-Loire and 30 minutes from Lamotte-Beuvron and its riding championship. Renovated in 2019, the house is modern and very welcoming. Quietly situated on a small property with pond, it has a large terrace with outdoor furniture and barbecue. Fully equipped, it is ideal for spending a weekend with friends or family holidays. 6 horse boxes have been equipped for riding championships at the price of €30/horse/night

Cottage in Ladon

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 116 reviews4.96 (116)

Villa Double Jacuzzi Sauna & Games

As a couple, with family or friends, come and relax, relax, rest and relax in the calm of the Magic Villa "De Calme et d 'Eau" Double Jacuzzi, Games & Sauna. ~ 1h30 from Paris and in the countryside in the middle of the fields, between Montargis Orléans and Pithiviers, high-end and mesmerizing indoor and outdoor setting. All consumables, Linen, Spa towels, shower... Bar, BBQ, Dining upon request. Two beds for two people. Two sofa beds. Meridian bed. Hammock.

Guest suite in Nibelle

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 146 reviews4.95 (146)

Cottage with Indoor SPA and outdoor heated pool

Come and enjoy relaxing a cocooning chalet after days of nature, sporty, or cultural. Furnished kitchen. Totally private indoor American spa Outdoor SPA by reservation, weather conditions and participation Price/service ratio not found. Linens provided, bed made. Fiber wifi + Netflix, bonus... Horse, bicycles, swimming *NON-SMOKING - Housekeeping NOT INCLUDED* Arrival 17:00 - 20:00 - Departure 10:00. Disinfection of €29 per stay 2 nice dogs!

Guesthouse in Vieilles-Maisons-sur-Joudry

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 129 reviews4.93 (129)

Petit gite de l 'Étang des Bois

Cottage composed of a large room (+/-25 m2) with sofa bed and double bed. Kitchen and bathroom. Small private garden with garden furniture and BBQ. Quietly located just opposite the Orleans Forest and the Woods Pond. Swimming beach. Possibility of many hikes, cycling, fishing, hunting, castles of the Loire Valley nearby. With a fee supplement: - Pony ride from the cottage - Horse carriage ride from the cottage

Home in LORRIS

4.89 out of 5 average rating, 175 reviews4.89 (175)

"la p'tite step" cottage close to all shops

Party not allowed (shared) the property is equipped with Minut (noise and occupancy detector) Between Gien and Montargis, very close to the forest of Orléans, we offer you an independent cottage (124 m2) close to all shops, in town and quiet. Please review our house rules for linens, cleaning, and rules. We live there and remain at your disposal for your stay. (You can meet us on the Lorris Tourist Board)

Rental unit in Beaune-la-Rolande

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 142 reviews4.96 (142)

Beaune la Rolande at "Puits Berger"

IN BEAUNE LA ROLANDE (Loiret) Close to Bellegarde, Beaumont, Ladon, Boynes, Corbeilles en Gatinais, Chambon, Escrennes, Auxerre, Puiseaux, Boiscommun, Quiers sur Bezonde, 20 km from Pithiviers, 25 km from Montargis and Malesherbes, 45 km from Fontainebleau, 50 km from Orléans 100 km from Paris Limitrophe de la Seine et Marne et de l 'Essonne.. motorway exit A19 at 5 km, close to A6, A77

Home in Montliard

4.81 out of 5 average rating, 105 reviews4.81 (105)

house on the edge of the wood

house located in the hamlet of a quiet village; 3 hectares of meadows and woods with our donkeys, goats, sheep, pigs, chickens, ducks, geese, rabbits, guinea pigs are nearby; beautiful walks or mountain biking are possible on the paths and small secondary roads from the house. You will have the opportunity to visit the educational farm (free) and for children to take a ride on a donkey (paying).

Home in Bouzy-la-Forêt

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 147 reviews4.95 (147)

House on large wooded property "Les Sables"

Charming house in the heart of its shaded and fenced park (3,600 m²). Ideal for families or for stays with friends (4 to 5 people). Bed linen (fitted sheet, fitted covers, duvet covers and pillowcases) provided. Towels (towels and gloves) provided. Baby cot upon request. Pets: pet welcome (cats and small dogs). House located 30' from Orleans and 30' from Montargis.
